mapper.sql: id, pre_id, user_id, day, status, first, source, reason, create_time
mapper.update: update t_acc_booking set pre_id = #{preId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, day = #{day,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, first = #{first,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, source = #{source,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
